inclusion.criterion: Who have given written informed consent after the nature of the study has been explained.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Who work within the Manchester Medical Microbiology Partnership and may be at potential occupational exposure to meningococci.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A serious chronic disease including progressive neurological disease or seizure disorder.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have a known bleeding diathesis, or any condition that may be associated with a prolonged bleeding time.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have a history of severe allergic reactions after previous vaccinations such as anaphylactic shock, asthma, urticaria, or other allergic reaction or hypersensitivity to any vaccine component.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
